hint: A large, yellow fruit that monkeys love to eat.
It has four legs and barks.
You use this to read stories and learn new things.
It flies in the sky and has feathers.
You drive this on roads. It has four wheels.
This sweet, red fruit grows on trees.
It has a trunk and green leaves, providing shade.
A friendly animal that meows and loves to nap.
A structure where people live.
You pedal this to ride. It has two wheels.
A small, green amphibian that jumps.
It swims in water and has fins.
A bright, warm star that lights up our day.
It's beautiful, colorful, and smells nice. Often found in gardens.
A shining object in the night sky, often twinkle.
A symbol of love, it pumps blood through your body.
A large body of salt water that covers most of Earth.
Green plants that grow on the ground, often in yards.
A round object in the night sky that changes shape.
Small, round, purple or green fruits that grow in bunches.
A round, orange citrus fruit with a thick skin.
A yellow dairy product made from milk, often on pizza.
A clear liquid that all living things need to survive.
A large, furry animal that likes honey and hibernates.
A pink farm animal that says 'oink' and loves mud.
A fluffy white farm animal that gives us wool.
A small, red fruit with a pit, often on top of desserts.
A baked food made from flour, often eaten with butter.
A white, fluffy object that floats in the sky.
A flat, green part of a plant that grows on branches.
A piece of furniture you sit on, often at a table.
A round object used in sports, can bounce.
A large, orange and black striped wild cat.
Something you wear on your head to keep warm or look nice.
A piece of clothing you wear on your upper body.
What you wear on your foot, goes inside your shoe.
Hot, orange flames that give light and heat.
Frozen water, cold and slippery.
A yellow vegetable with kernels, often eaten at movies.
A beautiful, fragrant flower, often red, symbol of love.
A long, slithery reptile with no legs.
A large animal people ride, has a mane and tail.
The largest animal in the ocean, very big and gray.
A sour, yellow citrus fruit used in drinks.
A furry animal that swings from trees and eats bananas.
A long body of flowing water, smaller than an ocean.
A very tall, rocky land formation that reaches toward the sky.
A small, yellow and black insect that makes honey.
A sweet dessert often eaten at birthday parties.
